config: Thank you very much to all who participated in our 2021 Justia "Pixcel" Challenge. We received a total of 13 fantastic submissions. With nine votes and after very tight voting, Lenin Angulo won second place and was awarded a $25 Amazon gift card. With 30 votes, Carolina Leija was crowned as the competition winner and received a $50 Amazon gift card. We were delighted by all the submissions full of quality, creativity, and talent. Get ready for the next edition!
